snippet: Some questions to consider about your 401(k) account with a previous employer: Cash it out, roll it over or let it ride?
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column on questions to consider about what to do with 401(k) accounts with previous employers when changing jobs; choices of whether to cash out, roll over or let it ride persist.
lead_paragraph: Some questions to consider about your 401(k) account with a previous employer: Cash it out, roll it over or let it ride?

headline.main: What to Do With Your Retirement Plan if You Change Jobs
headline.print_headline:
What to Do With Your 401(k)
When You Change Jobs
